# Auto-generated scenarios for RelaxNG schema gaps not yet implemented.
# These test the HTML5 content model rules enforced by epubcheck's
# RelaxNG schemas (Tier 1 validation).
# Generated by: python3 scripts/relaxng-audit.py --generate-tests

# --- Block-in-Inline Violations (Phrasing-Only Parents) ---

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [p-contains-div] <p> must not contain <div> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-p-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [p-contains-ul] <p> must not contain <ul> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-p-contains-ul.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [p-contains-table] <p> must not contain <table> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-p-contains-table.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [h1-contains-div] <h1> must not contain <div> (block in heading)
    When checking document 'rng-h1-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [span-contains-div] <span> must not contain <div> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-span-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [span-contains-p] <span> must not contain <p> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-span-contains-p.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [em-contains-div] <em> must not contain <div> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-em-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [strong-contains-div] <strong> must not contain <div> (block in inline)
    When checking document 'rng-strong-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

# --- Restricted Children Violations ---

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [ul-contains-div] <ul> can only contain <li> elements
    When checking document 'rng-ul-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [ol-contains-p] <ol> can only contain <li> elements
    When checking document 'rng-ol-contains-p.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [tr-contains-div] <tr> can only contain <td> or <th>
    When checking document 'rng-tr-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [select-contains-div] <select> can only contain <option> or <optgroup>
    When checking document 'rng-select-contains-div.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [table-contains-p] <table> can only contain caption, colgroup, thead, tbody, tfoot, tr
    When checking document 'rng-table-contains-p.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

# --- Void Element Violations ---

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [br-with-content] <br> is a void element and cannot have children
    When checking document 'rng-br-with-content.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [hr-with-content] <hr> is a void element and cannot have children
    When checking document 'rng-hr-with-content.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported

  @relaxng @pending
  Scenario: [img-with-content] <img> is a void element and cannot have children
    When checking document 'rng-img-with-content.xhtml'
    Then error RSC-005 is reported
